parameters: I mean - the whole Kyron thing?
\pop[4]Yeah, seems to be going just fine.
\pop[4]Taylor, I know it's a bit hard, but we have to trust him.
He can't be here to put our minds at ease \c[14]all\c[0] the time.
\pop[4]Let's just gloss over the part where you said it's hard to trust me, I guess.
\pop[3]But we \c[14]could\c[0] use a bit of reassurance.
Right, Klace? This could turn into a scandal.
\pop[3]I don't know. I've never had a reason to doubt Isaac.
If we were gonna get caught, it would've happened by now.
And things are only gonna get better from here on out.
Remember, \c[23]Argus\c[0] isn't exactly on standby anymore.
But with these protests, I hear they're sending out agents.
\pop[3]Yeah, and you wonder why I'm freaking out.
\pop[4]It's not like they're here for \c[14]us\c[0], Taylor.
They're gonna be dealing with the \c[10]zeros\c[0].
\pop[4]Yeah, this is the biggest security breach we've ever had.
Compared to that, we're absolutely nothing. Think about perspective.
\pop[3]I'm thinking, but it's just not doing me any good.
It's like - I just can't shake this feeling.
\pop[3]Or already has, and we're just not aware of it.
\pop[4]Let's see what Isaac has to say, then.
How exactly are you making things "better"?
\pop[4]Well, Kyron has a phone and identity, but it's pretty bare-bones.
So while he's a valid citizen, I need to make it more believable.
\pop[3]And how do you plan to do that?
\pop[4]Well, I \c[14]do\c[0] have some high-level access, remember.
So I've been giving him a life record. Not just an identity.
You know, family history, score history, social media...
And is he being a good citizen?
\pop[4]He has his ups and downs, but it looks realistic, for sure.
Had to be certain, just in case anyone ever decided to take a look.
\c[14]I\c[0] know we're safe, but I figured this could put your mind at ease, too.
\pop[3]You're allowed to do stuff like that?
Been using all that knowledge I picked up.
Can you at least promise me \c[14]one\c[0] thing?
\pop[3]If we ever \c[14]are\c[0] in trouble. Please just tell us.
I don't want to see this "tough guy" routine while the world takes us down.
\pop[3]Yeah. If something changes, please tell us.
\pop[4]Of course! Remember, this is all \c[14]my\c[0] doing.
No matter what happens, you'll be safe.
\pop[4]But I have to say, this \c[14]does\c[0] feel good.
I mean, giving Kyron the life he wants to have.
Not the one that \c[23]Argus\c[0] or his parents chose for him.
\pop[3]Maybe it won't be that way forever, right?
\pop[3]I don't know. But I'm curious about one thing.
How can you adjust people's scores like that?
\pop[4]Fine. It's a mix or \c[23]Argus\c[0]' trust in me, and my own abilities.
Don't act like I haven't been doing it for a while, either.
Remember those discounts I gave all of you?
\pop[4]Yeah, but now I've got a cause.
\pop[3]So it doesn't look like Kyron just "popped" into existence anymore?
I didn't add that much. Just... strengthened the core.
The more edits I make, the more suspicious it'd look in the logs.
